Digital Scholarship
Fellows

A one year, two part fellowship for undergraduates at the Univesity of Pennsylvania.

  • Continue
DS Fellows
  • homepage
  • Part One
  • Part Two
  • GitHub

Between September 2016 and August 2017, the Digital Scholarship Department at the Penn Libraries hosted a fellowship program for a group of undergraduates at the University of Pennsylvania. The program took place in two parts. During the academic year, two bost-baccalaureate fellows led 8 undergraduates in a series of lessons. During the summer, a new group of students, led by Graduate Fellow Leslie Jones, worked on a group project in support of the Monument Lab project.
